name: Drill Machine
description: Drilling machine, a powerful tool that can drill holes in wood, plastic and any hard objects.

name: Screwdriver
description: A screwdriver is a tool that can easily separate any type of flat nut.

name: Glue Gun
description: A simple shaped electric gun used to melt and apply glue sticks.

name: Soldering Iron
description: Soldering iron is a tool that provides heat for soldering.

name: Chisel
description: A chisel is the sharp edge of a blade used to shape wood or other materials.

name: Hammer
description: A hand tool consisting of a solid head set crosswise on a handle and used for pounding.

name: Spade
description: A tool with a sharp-edged, typically rectangular, metal blade and a long handle.

name: Paint Roller
description: A paint application tool used for painting large flat surfaces rapidly and efficiently.

name: Electric Saw
description: It has a large, toothed blade that can cut through wood with a back-and-forth sawing motion.
